attributes.action: UK Gov't to allow South African Farmers who are willing to come, entry to UK.
attributes.background: South African farmer are having their lands confiscated without compensation and are suffering an ignored genocide. Some are living in refugee camps. Bring those willing to come to the UK.

rejection.details: People from South Africa are already able to apply for a visa to live and work in the UK, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
